snippet: Three Nigerian journalists have been arrested and accused of inciting violence by saying on a radio show that polio immunizations were an anti-Islamic Western conspiracy.
abstract: Nigerian police arrest three journalists accused of inciting violence by saying on radio show that polio immunizations are anti-Islamic Western conspiracy days before health workers administering vaccines were killed.
lead_paragraph: Three Nigerian journalists have been arrested and accused of inciting violence by saying on a radio show that polio immunizations were an anti-Islamic Western conspiracy.
